name: Vector's Adventures
description: The blueprints are scattered and out of order! You must piece the worlds back together. Join Vector, a dot, the lowest form of geometry, in his adventure across the Shades of Blue as he battles a hierarchy of greater shapes. Wield the Architect's pen for puzzles and combat in the Land of Lines.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+ or higher Processor: Intel 2.4 GHz, Amd FX-8350 or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
